title: ‘No Other Choice’ Star Lee Byung-hun on His Historic Golden Globe Actor Nom and Park Chan-wook’s Latest: ‘I Knew I Would Be Laughing a Lot’
summary: Lee Byung-hun has a chance to make history — he’s the first Korean actor to be nominated for best actor, comedy or musical at the Golden Globes. The “No Other Choice” lead says he found out about the nomination from a friend — the actor was asleep in Korea when noms were announced. “I was […]
